archimate:ApplicationService.name: Financiele Analyse
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Ondersteunt de financiele analyse denk aan:
- kostprijscalculatie - rendement - contante waardes - horizontale analyses - Verticale analyses - Ratio's (contante waardes, current ratio, working captial, acid, turnover, debt to asset, ...) - Solvency - Liquidity - Profitability - What if scenario's m.b.v. kasstromen
